cast.overview: The story of Nina, a ballerina in a New York City ballet company whose life, like all those in her profession, is completely consumed with dance. She lives with her retired ballerina mother Erica who zealously supports her daughter's professional ambition. When artistic director Thomas Leroy decides to replace prima ballerina Beth MacIntyre for the opening production of their new season, Swan Lake, Nina is his first choice.
cast.title: Black Swan

cast.overview: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island residents are shattered when their addictions run deep.
cast.title: Requiem for a Dream

cast.overview: Aging wrestler Randy "The Ram" Robinson is long past his prime but still ready and rarin' to go on the pro-wrestling circuit. After a particularly brutal beating, however, Randy hangs up his tights, pursues a serious relationship with a long-in-the-tooth stripper, and tries to reconnect with his estranged daughter. But he can't resist the lure of the ring and readies himself for a comeback.
cast.title: The Wrestler

details.biography: Charlotte Aronofsky was born on January 24, 1941 in Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA. She is an actress, known for Requiem for a Dream (2000), Pi (1998) and Black Swan (2010). She is married to Abraham Aronofsky.
details.name: Charlotte Aronofsky
details.place_of_birth: Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA
